change.changenote: Section 1 (1) definition of "sheriff" BEFORE repealed by 2007-15-77, effective September 26, 2007 (BC Reg 298/2007).
Section 25 (a) BEFORE amended by 2010-6-97,Sch 7, effective July 1, 2010.

paragraph.paragraphtext: serving affidavit of claim, the same fees allowed to a sheriff under the Rules of Court;

change.changenote: Section 48 BEFORE amended by 2010-6-97,Sch 7, effective July 1, 2010.

section.sectiontext: The Rules of Court apply so far as they are consistent with this Act.
